name: MoonShooter
description:
This game was made in 5 days for the 2022 Bullet Hell Jam (Also my first game jam). #bullethelljam

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Left mouse button - Shoot/Grapple Turret (When close enough)

Right mouse button - Transform (Watch out for the timer!)

Enter - Pause game

R - Reset stage

F1 - Fullscreen toggle

HOW TO PLAY:

> You can kill everyone and everything shooting your gun.

> You can also transform for a while, that will protect you against bullets.

> If you see a Turret, you can approach and chain it to you. It will help you against enemies.

> Your goal is to kill the sun commander, but be careful! he possesses a deadly bullet, which slowly approaches you. Do not waste time!

THE THEME:

> I couldn't make much with the theme besides thinking in something confined between chains. This would be the playable character idea, but it ended up as a enemy gimmick. The another way was a confined character, which ended up being the armored char. while confined, imunnity.
